sqlMap.select:
select count(t.id) from t_user_driver_assess_info t, t_driver_user_info t1, t_web_user_info t2, t_transaction_info t3, t_order_cargo_info t4 where t.user_id = t2.id and t.driver_id = t1.id and t.transaction_id = t3.id and t.cargo_id = t4.id
t.driver_id= #driverId#
t.cargo_id = #cargoId#
t.user_id = #userId#
t.transaction_id = #transactionId#
t.arriver_evaluate_score like concat('%', #arriverEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.serve_evaluate_score like concat('%', #serveEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.trade_evaluate_score like concat('%', #tradeEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t4.cargo_name like concat('%', #cargoName# ,'%')
t1.code = #driverCode#
t1.name like concat('%', #driverName# ,'%')
t2.code = #userCode#
t2.name like concat('%', #userName# ,'%')
t3.order_number like concat('%', #orderNumber# ,'%')
t.create_time >= #queryTimeQ#
t.create_time <= DATE_SUB(#queryTimeZ#,INTERVAL -1 DAY)

select t.id, t.driver_id, t.cargo_id, t.user_id, t.transaction_id, t.arriver_evaluate_score, t.serve_evaluate_score, t.trade_evaluate_score, t.assess, t.create_time, t.modify_time, t4.cargo_name, t3.order_number, t1. code as driver_code, t1. name as driver_name, t2. code as user_code, t2. name as user_name from t_user_driver_assess_info t, t_driver_user_info t1, t_web_user_info t2, t_transaction_info t3, t_order_cargo_info t4 where t.user_id = t2.id and t.driver_id = t1.id and t.transaction_id = t3.id and t.cargo_id = t4.id
t.driver_id= #driverId#
t.cargo_id = #cargoId#
t.user_id = #userId#
t.transaction_id = #transactionId#
t.arriver_evaluate_score like concat('%', #arriverEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.serve_evaluate_score like concat('%', #serveEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.trade_evaluate_score like concat('%', #tradeEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t4.cargo_name like concat('%', #cargoName# ,'%')
t1.code = #driverCode#
t1.name like concat('%', #driverName# ,'%')
t2.code = #userCode#
t2.name like concat('%', #userName# ,'%')
t3.order_number like concat('%', #orderNumber# ,'%')
t.create_time >= #queryTimeQ#
t.create_time <= DATE_SUB(#queryTimeZ#,INTERVAL -1 DAY)
order by t.id desc limit #start#,#pageSize#

select t.id, t.driver_id, t.cargo_id, t.user_id, t.transaction_id, t.arriver_evaluate_score, t.serve_evaluate_score, t.trade_evaluate_score, t.assess, t.create_time, t.modify_time, t4.cargo_name, t3.order_number, t1. code as driver_code, t1. name as driver_name, t2. code as user_code, t2. name as user_name from t_user_driver_assess_info t, t_driver_user_info t1, t_web_user_info t2, t_transaction_info t3, t_order_cargo_info t4 where t.user_id = t2.id and t.driver_id = t1.id and t.transaction_id = t3.id and t.cargo_id = t4.id
t.driver_id= #driverId#
t.cargo_id = #cargoId#
t.user_id = #userId#
t.transaction_id = #transactionId#
t.arriver_evaluate_score like concat('%', #arriverEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.serve_evaluate_score like concat('%', #serveEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t.trade_evaluate_score like concat('%', #tradeEvaluateScore# ,'%')
t4.cargo_name like concat('%', #cargoName# ,'%')
t1.code = #driverCode#
t1.name like concat('%', #driverName# ,'%')
t2.code = #userCode#
t2.name like concat('%', #userName# ,'%')
t3.order_number like concat('%', #orderNumber# ,'%')
t.create_time >= #queryTimeQ#
t.create_time <= DATE_SUB(#queryTimeZ#,INTERVAL -1 DAY)
order by t.id desc

select t.id, t.driver_id, t.cargo_id, t.user_id, t.transaction_id, t.arriver_evaluate_score, t.serve_evaluate_score, t.trade_evaluate_score, t.assess, t.create_time, t.modify_time, t4.cargo_name, t3.order_number, t1. code as driver_code, t1. name as driver_name, t2. code as user_code, t2. name as user_name from t_user_driver_assess_info t, t_driver_user_info t1, t_web_user_info t2, t_transaction_info t3, t_order_cargo_info t4 where t.user_id = t2.id and t.driver_id = t1.id and t.transaction_id = t3.id and t.cargo_id = t4.id and id = #id#
sqlMap.update: update t_user_driver_assess_info t set t.driver_id = #driverId#, t.cargo_id = #cargoId#, t.user_id = #userId#, t.transaction_id = #transactionId#, t.arriver_evaluate_score = #arriverEvaluateScore#, t.serve_evaluate_score = #serveEvaluateScore#, t.trade_evaluate_score = #tradeEvaluateScore#, t.assess = #assess#, t.modify_time = now() where t.id = #id#
